text: Arthur slowly turned it over and over in his hands with a shrug and tossed it aside carelessly, but not so carelessly that it didn't make much odds whether he had his wipers on or off.

passages.fragment: Arthur slowly turned it over and over in his hands
passages.source_name: So Long And Thanks For All The Fish

passages.full_quote: Rain type 17 was a dirty blatter battering against his windscreen so hard <used>that it didn't make much odds whether he had his wipers on or off</used>
